message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit lopsided. How about a 55/45 split?
I see we're getting closer. How about we meet in the middle between our two offers?
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to be generous, but the clock is ticking.
Time may be on my side, but I'm still willing to compromise. This is my most generous offer yet.
This is absurd!  I'm taking a significant loss due to inflation, yet you refuse to budge.  It's a 50/50 split or nothing!
I understand your frustration, but I won't accept 50/50. This is my final compromise.
